name: Soul Harverster
description:
This game was our first attempt to create a game using Unreal engine, we tried to enable the online multiplayer feature using the free gameId from steam: "SpaceWar", but we couldn't test it. Therefore we are not sure if this entry support multiplayer correctly.

Intro:

This Project was inspired by the Irish Folklore faerie "The Sluagh".

These creature are said to hunt only during the nights and collect the souls of hopeless people are are usually seen with and sometimes confused with crows. 

In this Game, you take control of the King Sluagh and the shoot your underling from a cannon trying to harvest all the souls in the park before dawn. 

GamePlay: 

-WASD / Arrows to move the King Sluagh

Left click / E / SpaceBar to shoot the Sluagh

Mouse Position aim the cannon

Credits:

MarcoMing -> Programming coordinating the project

Gab3Disaster -> 3D models and animations

Maxuleny -> Music and sound effects
